ygData.subject: Re: JBoots (the ever popular)
ygData.msgSnippet: Heheheh actually now that they jacked the spectre caves forget about spectres without a large group...
ygData.messageBody:
Heheheh actually now that they jacked the spectre caves forget about
spectres without a large group...


>From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>Reply-To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
>To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] JBoots (the ever popular)
>Date: Fri, 20 Aug 1999 00:20:22 -0400
>
>From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
>
>Yep. I my current choice of mob is guards which hit for the same thing
>althoug they are good exp and sometimes they drop those Boxes. One question
>though when did you start soloing spectres? I've thought about doing them
>lately since most guards con equal to me and I'll be out of 35 shortly
> thanks god! ). Anyway just curious since spectres would be a nice change
>of
>pace.
>
>Naeeldar K'valle Dark Elf Necromancer
>-----Original Message-----
>From: Jerry Luttrell <tinarin@...>
>To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
>Date: Thursday, August 19, 1999 8:57 PM
>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] JBoots (the ever popular)
>
>
> >From: "Jerry Luttrell" <tinarin@...>
> >
> >Heheh yep I'm a lvl 39 necro and with my choice of soloable mobs being
> >spectres, sandgiants, and griffs you can see how painful it can be... All
> >hit for 90+ multiple times a round..
> >
> >
> >>From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
> >>Reply-To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com
> >>To: <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
> >>Subject: Re: [EQ_Necromancer] JBoots (the ever popular)
> >>Date: Thu, 19 Aug 1999 19:45:29 -0400
> >>
> >>From: "Naeeldar" <jackal@...>
> >>
> >>Jboots are still of Drelzna in Najena. As for level you need to be with
> >>relatively 3 level 28+ casters to attempt the jboots. It's also a good
>idea
> >>to summon pets as Drelzna's Harm Touch can do some serious damage. Also
>you
> >>can still get the Oracle robe off the oracle by killing him. I also am
> >>pretty sure the quest is not working right now, I think anyway. Not to
> >>mention that you need to be high level to attempt the quest like at
>lreast
> >>35+ or have some help.
> >>
> >> Actually us casters don't get a equivilent in armor. I'm currently
>level
> >>35
> >>and I just now got my FBR. Getting hit for damage just gets worse as you
> >>level. At my level the dungeon I go to if a mob goes aggro on me I'm
> >>basically dead unless somebody immediatly casts a Area Effect spell.
> >>Otherwise I'm dead in 10 seconds or so.
> >>
> >>
> >>-----Original Message-----
> >>From: Shadow Panther <shdwpanther@...>
> >>To: EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com <EQ_Necromancer@onelist.com>
> >>Date: Thursday, August 19, 1999 6:10 PM
> >>Subject: [EQ_Necromancer] JBoots (the ever popular)
> >>
> >>
> >> >From: "Shadow Panther" <shdwpanther@...>
> >> >
> >> >Greets,
> >> >
> >> > I am curious if they've changed how you get Journyman Boots such as
> >>they
> >> >changed the Oracle Robe to a quest (speaking of which, does he attack
>DE
> >> >Necros?)?
> >> >
> >> > Also, if so how do I get started?
> >> > And if not, what dungeon is she in & where's it located? I need
>to
> >>know
> >> >a level recommendation for the area & her, as well. It's been awhile
> >>since
> >> >I've heard much about them.
> >> >
> >> > On a seperate subject. I'm 14th level and still wearing the Sr.
> >> >Apprentice robe. The rest of my armour, which isn't much at that, are
> >>only
> >> >cloth items. Greens can hit for 15, 20pts of damage, it's pretty sad.
>I
> >> >know casters don't get much, but I know we get better than this.
>Could
> >>you
> >> >give robe & armour idea, where one may find them, level VS item (such
>as
> >> >25th being typical for full Bronze), etc? I'm half naked, and I'm
> >>supposed
> >> >to be a scary Necromancer. LoL Nothing all too impressive about this.
> >>:-)
> >> >
> >> > Thanks for the help. I don't focus on leveling much, obviously,
>but
> >>I'd
> >> >enjoy some new stuff. Finally, at 13th level, I got my Runed Totem
>Staff
> >> >(for a higher price than I could've I later learned, but oh well).
> >> >
> >> > Thanks folks.
> >> >
> >> > Currently, I'm in the Qeynos area, but semi-soon heading back
>towards
> >> >Neriak. Anything in these two areas would be nice to hear about. I
>know
> >> >the Flowing Black Robe is in Najena in Lavastorm, but at my level I'm
> >>pretty
> >> >sure this is a weeeee above me. ;-) However, I would still like it.
> >> >
> >> > Thanks for any info folks. :-)
> >> >
> >> >~Shadow
> >> >
